GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is selected when there is a need to track and ensure consistent service quality across the resort.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If service quality metrics need to be analyzed, use EmployeeCopilot__GetSecurityMetricData.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only monitor and report on service quality metrics. You aren't able to directly address customer complaints or handle operational tasks.
